Function reference

Centrix

Functions

wrangle_centrix()
Wrangle Raw Centrix Data
preprocess_signal_events() preprocess_track_events()
Preprocess raw Centrix data
calculate_time_windows()
Calculate train journey intervals
filter_aspect_events() filter_track_events()
Filter Centrix events by time intervals
calculate_tsars()
Calculate TSAR and Sub-Components.
cluster_journeys()
Cluster train journeys
plot_clusters()
Plot clustered train journeys

Data

raw_centrix
Example Centrix data
asset_map
Example asset map
state_mapping
Default signal state to aspect mapping
aspect_events
Example aspect events
track_events
Example track events
time_windows
Example time windows
valid_aspect_events
Example of processed aspect events
valid_track_events
Example of processed track events
berth_events
Example of berth-level events
berth_events_groups
Example of wrangled Centrix data

Timetable

Functions

wrangle_timetable()
Wrangle Timetable Data
filter_relevant_services() filter_relevant_direction()
Filter timetable to relevant trains
find_calling_patterns()
Find calling patterns from timetable
calculate_journey_specifications()
Calculate journey specifications
match_ids()
Match Centrix and Timetable IDs

Data

Example timetable data

Example stations

Example stopping stations

Example timetable subset
timetable_specification
Example timetable specification
id_matching
Example ID Matching

Functions

Estimate dwell times

Object Orientation (Unimplemented)

Create new track event

Create new aspect object

Check if object is of class aspect
